name: .TYP
summary: Learn about .TYP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: While you can open and edit TYP files with any text editor, it's best to edit TYP files with Typst's official online editor. This app highlights TYP syntax and shows a preview of how Typst will format your TYP file.

If you want to publish the document a TYP file describes, you can do so using Typst's online editor or its command-line compiler. For more information about the command-line version of Typst, click here.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .typ file in Typst
images.caption: TYP file open in Typst
